alert.note: Alert for Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 5:57PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Prowers County through 645 PM MDT... At 557 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles northeast of Two Buttes, or 23 miles northwest of The Saunders Elevator, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Prowers County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.
